Option.Name: MapSequenceComboNames
Option.Description: + separated list of names, referencing the names of Map/Sequence combos defined in Automated Perf Test | Sequence Project Settings

Option.Name: StaticCameraMapNames
Option.Description: + separated list of names, referencing the names of Maps defined in Automated Perf Test | Static Camera Project Settings

Option.Name: ReplayName
Option.Description: Name of replay to run when running Automated Perf Test Replay
